name: Parasite's Dungeon
description:
Play in Fullscreen mode to the best experience.

Help us!

A star has fallen from the sky and a monster has come out and ravaged our kingdom!

Go through all the rooms of the castle to reach the exit.

Remember: that infernal monster fears the light!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to interact

ESCAPE to return to the menu

Informations:

Game made in two days for Jame Gam #24, unfortunately arrived late due to personal commitments.

All game components are made by me, except for:

  • Game icons (https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=ui);
  • Fonts (https://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=13587);
  • Dialogs UI (https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=ui);
  • A* Pathfinding (https://arongranberg.com/astar/);

I hope you enjoy it as a prototype game, any feedback, whether negative or positive, is greatly appreciated.

I hope you have fun and you enjoy the game!
